item.title: Introduction
item.description: Hello this is my first post on my website. Im Akhilesh and currently studying class 12 in Mangalore. This site was made with Hugo Framework The site is hosted on Github Pages Hugo framework is written in Go Programming Language You can find the website theme at Hugo Themes: Terminal This is a static site and does not contain any javascript. You can find me on Discord as sekki1
item.content:
Hello this is my first post on my website.

  • Im Akhilesh and currently studying class 12 in Mangalore.

  • This site was made with Hugo Framework

  • The site is hosted on Github Pages

  • Hugo framework is written in Go Programming Language

  • You can find the website theme at Hugo Themes: Terminal

  • This is a static site and does not contain any javascript.

You can find me on Discord as sekki1
